title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 177.0 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 177.0 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish: the
administrative procedures for the issuance and use of hunting, fishing and
trapping licenses and the voluntary habitat stamp; the administrative
procedures and requirements for reporting license sales and remitting license
revenue by license issuing agents and license issuing officers; and the fee for
the habitat stamp. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
177.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
